name: Roma Inmortuus
description:
Roma Inmortuus

Roma Inmortuus is a third person single player dungeon crawler, focused on action, hack and slash, in which the player will face an army of enemies with help of his summoned AI companions. 

The core mechanics of Roma Inmortuus are the ability to summon two AI Companions, to help the player survive and fight against the numerous enemies, as well as assist him with challenges and tasks.  To complete the vertical slice, the player must reach the end of the dungeon by unlocking passages and completing tasks throughout the level, all while surviving the hordes of enemies

Game Artist: Marcelo Mendonça

Game Designer: Ricardo Alves

Game Programmer: Miguel Runte
